___list.description: Display a selectable list of widgets and activities received through a resource.

___resource.description: The topic of the resource with the list.

___select.description: Select a widget from the list and publish resources with data of the selected widget.

___parameter.description: The place parameter for the flow definition.

___parameterList.description: A list with place parameters which are overwritten with an empty string.

___resource.description: The topic of the resource with the documentation markdown url.
The topic of the resource with the package.json content.
The topic of the resource with the widget.json content.
The topic of the resource with the url to the test runner.

name: widget-browser-widget
description: The widget-browser-widget displays a list of all widget and activities and lets the user select one.
